CWEs: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
description: The function unique_name_655 is vulnerable to SQL Injection. The function constructs a SQL query by concatenating user-controlled input (from the 'options' parameter) into the query. An attacker could provide specially crafted input to modify the query, leading to unauthorized data access, data corruption or data loss.
